creator: jefft@apache.org
text:
If conf/Catalina/localhost/mywebapp.xml is a symlink, Tomcat deploys, but
deletes the file's content and so breaks on subsequent reloads.  I'm guessing
Tomcat is trying to rewrite mywebapp.xml, and isn't following the symlink properly.

The symlink goes to a directory outside Tomcat's, but the user starting Tomcat
has read/write permission there.
Symlinks for the context.xml files are not supported.
